data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Compassion as a concept is difficult to pin down. In ____, ____ relates ____ the ____ of ____. To ____ oneself ____ another, and ____ to ____ the ____ emotions ____ the ____ is ____, ____ a ____ act. Sympathy for another's plight is also a key component.
data.partBlankContent: Compassion as a concept is difficult to pin down. In ess____, i_ relates t_ the id__ of emp____. To ima____ oneself a_ another, and att____ to fe__ the ve__ emotions th__ the ot___ is fee____, i_ a compas_______ act. Sympathy for another's plight is also a key component.
data.answer: 同情心作为一个概念是很难确定的。本质上，它与同理心的概念有关。把自己想象成另一个人，试着去感受另一个人正在感受的情绪，这是一种富有同情心的行为。对他人困境的同情也是一个关键组成部分。
